author: psmith
msg: Added the concept of "hidding" a logger by being able
to add it to an Ignore list.
Only Loggers that are not on the Ignored list are shown.

author: psmith
msg: Fixed bug where a settings Listener was never given a chance to load settings
and so the previous configs used were not presented
in the No Receivers Warning dialog.

author: sdeboy
msg: Corrected some comments and added attribution

author: sdeboy
msg: New test class for working through expression building and evaluation - supporting infix to postfix conversion, boolean operators and custom operators (regexp, partial text match, etc.)
